subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Alpine Skiing
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Mikaela Shiffrin, the 18-year-old star of American skiing, was in range of another victory in slalom, but she hit a deep rut that resulted in a seventh place finish at a race in Slovenia.
snippet: Mikaela Shiffrin, the 18-year-old star of American skiing, was in range of another victory in slalom, but she hit a deep rut that resulted in a seventh place finish at a race in Slovenia.
